00021         bool friendsAreAround()
00022         {
00023                 int count = 0;
00024                 ConstGameObjectIter itr;
00025                 const GameObjectList* objects = ws->getAllGameObjects();
00026                 for (itr = objects->begin();itr != objects->end(); itr++)
00027                 {
00028                         if ((*itr)->isPlayer == false && (*itr)->faction == PROJECTILE_FACTION == false)
00029                                 count++;
00030                 }
00031                 return count >= 2;
00032         }
